attributes.action: I would like you to keep the 6 weeks holidays the same and not shorten it
attributes.background: Keep the 6 weeks the same because students now adays barely have time off and can only have two days break (weekend) and then go to school for 5 days, are forced to do homework so even then we still don’t get a break but the 6 week is time of rest and to go on holiday

rejection.details: The Government has not announced any plans to reduce the length of school summer holidays in England, so we're not sure what you want the Government or Parliament to do.
